ai-thag14.2:1.2_0: a yoke with a yoke, pin.
ai-thag14.2:1.3_0: Though oppressed by the heavy burden,
ai-thag14.2:1.4_0: it doesn’t shake off the yoke.
ai-thag14.2:2.1_0: So too, those who are as full of wisdom
ai-thag14.2:2.4_0: this is the teaching of the noble ones for living creatures.
ai-thag14.2:3.1_0: People who fall under the sway of time,
ai-thag14.2:3.2_0: the sway of rebirth in this or that state,
ai-thag14.2:3.4_0: and those young men grieve in this life.
ai-thag14.2:4.1_0: Elated by things that bring happiness,
ai-thag14.2:4.2_0: downcast by things that bring suffering:
ai-thag14.2:4.4_0: who doesn’t see things as they are.
ai-thag14.2:5.1_0: But those who in suffering, and in happiness,
ai-thag14.2:5.2_0: and in the middle have overcome the weaver—
ai-thag14.2:5.3_0: they stand like a boundary pillar,
ai-thag14.2:7.2_0: like a droplet on a lotus-leaf.
ai-thag14.2:9.1_0: There’s the fame of the unintelligent,
ai-thag14.2:9.2_0: and there’s the disrepute of the discerning.
ai-thag14.2:9.3_0: The disrepute of the discerning is better
ai-thag14.2:9.4_0: than the fame of the unintelligent.
ai-thag14.2:10.2_0: and there’s criticism by the discerning.
ai-thag14.2:10.3_0: Criticism by the discerning is better
ai-thag14.2:11.1_0: There’s the happiness of sensual pleasures,
ai-thag14.2:11.2_0: and there’s the suffering of seclusion.
ai-thag14.2:11.3_0: The suffering of seclusion is better
ai-thag14.2:11.4_0: than the happiness of sensual pleasures.
ai-thag14.2:13.1_0: who has given up sensual pleasures and has given up;
ai-thag14.2:13.2_0: their minds at peace regarding rebirth in this or that state,
ai-thag14.2:13.4_0: for them nothing is beloved or unloved.
ai-thag14.2:14.7_0: The Book of the Fours is finished.
